titleStmt.title: A treatise collected out of the statutes of this commonwealth, and according to common experience of the lawes, concerning the office and authorities of coroners and sherifes together with an easie and plaine method for the keeping of a court leet, court baron, and hundred court, &c. / by John Wilkinson of Bernards Inne, Gent. ; to which is added the returne of writts by John Kitchin Esq ; now all published in English.
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, John, of Bernards Inne.
Kitchin, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Lee, D. Pakeman, R. Best, and G. Bedell ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Kitchin's "Return of the writts" lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
